min_time_stationary.description: Minimum time being stationary before beginning to reposition. Time while doing abilities is included.

max_time_stationary.description: Maximum time being stationary before beginning to reposition. Time while doing abilities is included.

min_time_repositioning.description: Minimum time repositioning before going back to stationary. Time while doing abilities is excluded.

max_time_repositioning.description: Maximum time repositioning before going back to stationary. Time while doing abilities is excluded.

max_flank_angle.description: The maximum flank angle. If 0, the enemy would travel straight towards the target, 90 would be perpendicular and could orbit the target (if looked at).

min_distance.description: The minimum distance from target where we would enable repositioning.

max_distance.description: The maximum distance from target where we would enable repositioning. 0 means no distance limitation.
